Sentencas: An original 3D stochastic geometrical model has been developed to simulate the microstructural evolution of porous solid-oxide cell electrodes made of yttria-stabilized zirconia and nickel.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: The microstructural change induced by Ni agglomeration has been more specifically simulated.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: The model is based on random sets and algorithms for solving the linear assignment problem related to the time evolution of one component in the microstructure.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: The possibility to generate realistic 3D microstructures with the model has been verified by comparing the geometrical characteristics of synthetic microstructures with those extracted from real electrode reconstructions.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: The ability of the Stochastic Time Evolution Microstructure (STEM) model to generate microstructures with evolving characteristics has been then illustrated and compared to real data obtained on aged electrodes.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: The error on most of the geometrical characteristics are in general lower than 10%, except in some particular cases, such as the microstructure factor.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes

Sentencas: All the results have then been discussed and suggestions have been proposed for improving the model.
Titulo: A stochastic geometrical 3D model for time evolution simulation of microstructures in SOC-electrodes
